name: Simple Health Bar
description: Adds a simple health bar to the left of the minimap.

options.name: Default
options.tooltip: Default colour scheme.

options.name: RGB
options.tooltip: RGB colour scheme.

options.name: GBR
options.tooltip: Green, Blue, and Red colour scheme using H:WOA's own green, blue, red, and yellow.

options.name: WOA
options.tooltip: Hitman: World of Assassination colour scheme using the game's own green, yellow, and red.

options.name: WOA Sick
options.tooltip: Hitman: World of Assassination colour scheme using the game's own green, yellow, and red for the health bar. Infected is a more sickly shade of yellow-green.

options.name: WOA Dark
options.tooltip: Hitman: World of Assassination colour scheme using a darker red and green to match Heritage UI.

options.name: WOA Dark and Sick
options.tooltip: Hitman: World of Assassination colour scheme using a darker red and green to match Heritage UI. Infected is a more sickly shade of yellow-green.
Hitman (2016) colour scheme using the original green, yellow, and red.

options.name: 2016 Sick
options.tooltip: Hitman (2016) colour scheme using the original green, yellow, and red. Infected is a more sickly shade of yellow-green.

options.name: 2016 Red
options.tooltip: Hitman (2016) colour scheme using its orginal red for all three health conditions.

options.name: 2016 Red and Sick
options.tooltip: Hitman (2016) colour scheme using its orginal red for all three health conditions. Infected is a more sickly shade of yellow-green.

options.name: 2016 GOTY
options.tooltip: Hitman (2016) colour scheme with a white and red health bar.

options.name: 2016 GOTY and Sick
options.tooltip: Hitman (2016) colour scheme with a white and red health bar. Infected is a more sickly shade of yellow-green.

options.name: Blood Money
options.tooltip: Hitman: Blood Money colour scheme using the original red for all three health conditions. The original yellow alert level is used for infected.

options.name: Blood Money Sick
options.tooltip: Hitman: Blood Money colour scheme using the original red for all three health conditions. Infected is a more sickly shade of yellow-green.

options.name: Blood Money GYR
options.tooltip: Hitman: Blood Money inpsired colour scheme using the original green, yellow, and red.

options.name: Blood Money GYR and Sick
options.tooltip: Hitman: Blood Money inpsired colour scheme using the original green, yellow, and red. Infected is a more sickly shade of yellow-green.

options.name: Bloody Legacy
options.tooltip: Bloody Legacy colour scheme with reds from Blood Money, Hitman (2016), and WOA.

options.name: Bloody Legacy Reversed
options.tooltip: Bloody Legacy colour scheme with reds from Blood Money, Hitman (2016), and WOA in reversed order.

options.name: Paladins
options.tooltip: Paladins health bar colour scheme using Blue for full and medium, red-orange for low, and a slight off-yellow for infected.

options.name: Default
options.tooltip: Default colour scheme.

options.name: Bright
options.tooltip: Bright colour scheme.

options.name: WOA Darker
options.tooltip: Hitman WOA colour scheme to match the darker grey sections of the map.

options.name: WOA Dark
options.tooltip: Hitman WOA colour scheme to match the dark grey sections of the map.

options.name: WOA Medium
options.tooltip: Hitman WOA colour scheme to match the medium grey sections of the map.

options.name: WOA Light
options.tooltip: Hitman WOA colour scheme to match the light grey sections of the map.

options.name: WOA Lighter
options.tooltip: Hitman WOA colour scheme to match the lighter grey sections of the map.

options.name: WOA Lightest
options.tooltip: Hitman WOA colour scheme to match the lightest grey sections of the map.

options.name: WOA White
options.tooltip: Hitman WOA colour scheme with a white background.

options.name: 2016 Black
options.tooltip: Hitman (2016) colour scheme with a black background.

options.name: 2016 Darker
options.tooltip: Hitman (2016) colour scheme with a darker grey background.

options.name: 2016 Dark
options.tooltip: Hitman (2016) colour scheme with a dark grey background.

options.name: 2016 Medium
options.tooltip: Hitman (2016) colour scheme with a medium grey background.

options.name: 2016 Light
options.tooltip: Hitman (2016) colour scheme with a light grey background.

options.name: 2016 Lighter
options.tooltip: Hitman (2016) colour scheme with a lighter grey background.

options.name: 2016 White
options.tooltip: Hitman (2016) colour scheme with a solid white background.

options.name: Blood Money
options.tooltip: Blood Money colour scheme with the classic red for the health text, a white text background, and a grey health bar background.

options.name: Blood Money Black
options.tooltip: Blood Money colour scheme with a darker red for the health text, a black text background, and a black health bar background.

options.name: Blood Money Darker
options.tooltip: Blood Money colour scheme with a darker red for the health text, a dark grey text background, and a dark grey health bar background.

options.name: Blood Money Dark
options.tooltip: Blood Money colour scheme with a darker red for the health text, a white text background, and a dark grey health bar background.

options.name: Blood Money Light
options.tooltip: Blood Money colour scheme with the classic red for the health text, a white text background, and a light grey health bar background.

options.name: Blood Money White
options.tooltip: Blood Money colour scheme with the classic red for the health text, a white text background, and a white health bar background.

options.name: Bloody Legacy and White Text
options.tooltip: Bloody Legacy colour scheme with reds from Blood Money, Hitman (2016), and WOA with white text.

options.name: Bloody Legacy and Black Text
options.tooltip: Bloody Legacy colour scheme with reds from Blood Money, Hitman (2016), and WOA with black text.

options.name: Bloody Legacy Reversed and White Text
options.tooltip: Bloody Legacy Reversed colour scheme with reds from Blood Money, Hitman (2016), and WOA with white text.

options.name: Bloody Legacy Reversed and Black Text
options.tooltip: Bloody Legacy Reversed colour scheme with reds from Blood Money, Hitman (2016), and WOA with black text.

options.name: Black
options.tooltip: Black colour scheme.

options.name: Slightly Darker Black
options.tooltip: Slightly Darker Black colour scheme.

options.name: RGBY
options.tooltip: RGB Why? colour scheme using H:WOA's own red, green, blue, and yellow.
